issues accessing one com pages hello regarding task infrastructure already task about investigating why web working external networks for you can contact provide you with using you be able work with web available for employees only for employees clients have access could you help with obtaining best regards engineer en sent tuesday re notification error when accessing documents hi we within guess means external regards hello could you tell if you use external or best regards engineer sent friday re notification error when accessing documents hi still can open files hub with same error with kind regards sent friday notification error when accessing documents hello everyone please be advised below issue fixed you can open any document using chrome browser should you still encounter any sort issues with above mentioned please contact we gladly help out thank you for your understanding kind regards analyst ext hub sent thursday notification error when accessing documents hello everyone you have noticed certain documents one cannot be using chrome browser issue originates fact browser cannot fully implement certain features our platform offers we aware issue we currently investigating meanwhile we advise you use explorer or for opening documents we apologize for inconveniences caused we notify you more information becomes available kind regards analyst ext hub

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Tickets**

I'm currently focused on analyzing the text of an IT ticket to assign it to the most fitting category from the provided list. My process involves dissecting the ticket's content to identify keywords and contextual clues that align with categories like "Hardware," "Access," or "Purchase."

**Identifying Ticket Category**

I've successfully analyzed the provided IT ticket text, pinpointing its core issue. The recurring themes of access restrictions and browser compatibility errors clearly point towards the "Access" category.
